amendment.description: To require the Food and Drug Administration to determine whether certain substances create any health risks and mislead consumers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1005 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1005 proposed by Senator Brown for Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S5699-5705) To require the Food and Drug Administration to determine whether certain substances create any health risks and mislead consumers.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1005 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1005 proposed by Senator Brown for Senator Levin.
